p1: This is my personal blogging and portfolio site which i have created to share my work and learnings in my frontend development journey. By building this project i learned how to send emails and verify for newsletter subscription. Also, my TailwindCSS styling skills got really improved by building this.
p2: For Designing, i took inspiration from other similar sites and user interface designs at dribbble.com

p1: Talk-a-Tive is a live chat web application which allows you to chat and send media files in realtime with other users of the application. By building this project, I learned how websockets work and how client and server can communicate in realtime.
p2: I took inspiration from other similar platforms like Whatsapp, Telegram, etc. which are similar in terms of providing users a space to communicate and share images, videos and documents.
